## Description
<!-- Describe what feature, API, or process needs documentation -->

## User Stories
• As a [user type]: I want [documentation goal] so that [benefit]
• As a [user type]: I need [information] to [achieve outcome]

## Tasks
- [ ] Research existing documentation
- [ ] Create/update documentation content
- [ ] Review and validate accuracy
- [ ] Integrate with existing docs

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Documentation is clear and comprehensive
- [ ] Examples and code snippets included where needed
- [ ] Follows project documentation standards
- [ ] Accessible to target audience

## Technical Requirements
• Documentation format (Markdown, JSDoc, etc.)
• Integration with existing documentation system
• Code examples tested and validated
• Cross-references and links maintained

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Documentation written and reviewed
- [ ] Technical accuracy verified
- [ ] Integrated into documentation system
- [ ] Peer review completed
- [ ] Published and accessible
